reapack.name: luiza177_Extend time selection by one measure.lua
reapack.desc: Extend time selection by one measure

reapack.name: luiza177_Transpose down to previous note in custom view.lua
reapack.desc: Transpose notes down to next visible note in Custom Note Order mode

reapack.name: luiza177_Transpose up to next note in custom view.lua
reapack.desc: Transpose MIDI notes up to next visible note in Custom Note Order view (or just transpose notes up by a semitone)
